markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Isis (Queen of Miracles)](/Deities.aspx?ID=54)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Provide aid to the sick and wounded, use magic to help others, mourn the cherished dead, ritually purify yourself before entering sacred areas

**Anathema** Reveal sacred rites to the uninitiated, betray your children or your lover, discriminate based on social status

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **2nd**
[Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

- **5th**
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51)

- **6th**
[Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=363)

- **7th**
[Magnificent Mansion](/Spells.aspx?ID=183)

- **8th**
[Wind Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=376)

- **9th**
[Shapechange](/Spells.aspx?ID=278)

</column>
name: Isis (Queen of Miracles)
